metadata.title: CVE-2022-2585 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: It was discovered that when exec'ing from a non-leader thread, armed POSIXCPU timers would be left on a list but freed, leading to a use-after-free.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
